name: One-Hit Wonders in The Movies Quiz / Test | Classic Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: Linda Blair was the child star of a major movie; she hasn't been seen in a movie of comparable character since. Who directed her in her big moment?
questions.explanation:
William Friedkin.

	'The Exorcist', with Ellen Burstyn. Huge hit ... but Blair's fortunes didn't rise.

questions.text: Janet Suzman was nominated for an Oscar, but never became a huge star. What type of movie provided her with that role?
questions.explanation:
Historical.

	'Nicholas and Alexandra'. Whatever happened to her?

questions.text: Gail Russell wasn't really a one-hit wonder, but her career was short. One of her best roles may have been as a Quaker in a western; who was her co-star?
questions.explanation:
John Wayne.

	'Angel and the Badman'. Short career, short life.

questions.text: Katharine Houghton had a starring role in a movie that featured what prominent acting couple?
questions.explanation:
Spencer Tracy and Katharine Hepburn.

	'Guess Who's Coming to Dinner?', with Sidney Poitier. Beautiful girl with a nice debut - who seems to have dropped out of sight shortly thereafter.

questions.text: Jane Greer starred in one of the top film noir movies of all time. Who was her co-star?
questions.explanation:
Robert Mitchum.

	'Out of the Past' is considered one of the best of the genre.

questions.text: Sue Lyon is best known for a starring role in a movie that was based on this author's novel.
questions.explanation:
Vladimir Nabokov.

	'Lolita', with James Mason. A few other movies, but that's all.

questions.text: Susan Anspach starred in this movie, but later hit hard times. Who was her co-star in the movie?
Sharon Tate's career was fatally interrupted by Charles Manson. She's best known for her work in a movie that is based on a novel by this author.
Louise Fletcher also got Oscar consideration for her acting in one movie. Who was the author of the novel on which the movie was based?
questions.explanation:
Ken Kesey.

	'One Flew Over The Cuckoo's Nest'.

questions.text: Jayne Mansfield had a few movie roles, but is best known for a comedy in which she starred with this actor.
questions.explanation:
Tony Randall.

	'Will Success Spoil Rock Hunter?'
